name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years in full stack development, skilled in **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **CI/CD** processes. Proficient in **Azure** cloud services, utilizing **Python** and **Go** for robust backend development. Expertise in managing databases including **MongoDB**, **CosmosDB**, and **PostgreSQL**. Versatile in JavaScript/TypeScript and **Node.js** for frontend and backend solutions. Demonstrated ability in creating effective monitoring systems using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **OpenTelemetry**, and **Datadog**.

Adept at deploying and managing containerized applications with **Docker** and orchestrating workflows with **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, **GitLab CI**, and **Argo CD**. Strong foundation in building AI/ML-powered platforms, specializing in model training and serving. Extensive experience in compliance-driven development, aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
